package.name: SecurePay_SecureXML
package.summary: Enables credit-card payments via the SecurePay gateway
package.description:
The SecurePay Australia XML API plugin enables support in Magento for the following credit-card transactions:

  • Standard Credit, when in Authorize + Capture mode
  • Preauth/Advice (Preauthorise + Complete), when in Authorize mode
  • Reverse (Void)
  • Refund
  • FraudGuard (Standard payment & Preauth)

The SecurePay payment gateway allows transactions from the following card types:

  • Visa
  • American Express
  • Mastercard
  • Diners Club
  • JCB

1.0.8 adds support for FraudGuard transactions. If enabled in Magento and on your SecurePay account, all payments and preauthorizations will be screened for fraudulent activity.

Note: you may need to create the folder magento/var/log (with +rwx permissions) in order to use Debug mode. Debug mode logs transaction details and issues to magento/var/log/Sxml.log

This module has been tested and is working correctly with Magento 1.4.0.1
package.notes: Provides support for the following kinds of credit-card transactions, via the SecurePay gateway: Standard payment Preauthorize Complete Void Refund FraudGuard (Standard & Preauthorize)
